word: If you respond to the drawing of Jesus, you will not fail to have an influence on somebody through the beauty and power of the grace of Christ. Let us behold Him and become changed into the image of Him in whom dwelleth all the fullness of the Godhead bodily, and realize that we are accepted in the Beloved, "complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power" (Colossians 2:10).--Bible Echo, Feb. 15, 1892.
